title: Hoshizora e Kakaru Hashi OVA
alternative_title: Hoshizora e Kakaru Hashi: Kakaru ka? Gakuensai ni Koi no Hashi, 星空へ架かる橋　架かるか？学園祭に恋の橋
description: Kazuma’s brother Ayumu needs to recuperate from an illness, so they move from the city to a rural mountain village. They plan to board at their father’s inn Yorozuyo, but get lost on their way. Wandering in the mountains, Kazuma stumbles across a girl named Ui Nakatsugawa. It’s the first of many encounters in his new country life.
